actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: A bill to prohibit the sale or importation of eyeglass frames or sunglasses made of cellulose nitrate or other flammable materials.

summary.text: Prohibits the sale or importation of eyeglass frames or sunglasses made of cellulose nitrate or other flammable materials. Allows a 30 day grace period for imports, and a 6 month period for disposal of existing shelf or display stocks. Prescribes a $1,000 fine for each eyeglass or sunglass frame imported or sold in violation of this Act.

titles.title: A bill to prohibit the sale or importation of eyeglass frames or sunglasses made of cellulose nitrate or other flammable materials.
